text: Abdul Rahim (7 June 1902 – 14 November 1977) was an Indian politician of the Indian National Congress. He served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from 3 April 1958, to 2 April 1962. He was born in Madras, to Kazi Abdul Karim. He joined the Indian National Congress and served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from 1958 to 1962. He was also a prolific writer and had authored four books in Tamil. == Family == Abdul Rahim married Bibijan. The couple had one son and two daughters. == References == * Category:1902 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Tamil Nadu
title: Abdul Rahim (Indian politician)
